snippet: Some authorities are convinced that what will drive future prosperity is not population, but investment in technology, education and health care.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Beijing, and Michael Forsythe contributed reporting from Hong Kong. Yingzhi Yang contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Some authorities are convinced that what will drive future prosperity is not population, but investment in technology, education and health care.

headline.main: Experts Weigh Likely Impacts of China’s ‘One Child’ Reversal
